references.formattedCitation: Talbert, Richard J. A., ed. Barrington Atlas of the Greek and Roman World. Princeton, N.J.: Princeton University Press, 2000. http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/43970336.

description: A group of small islands lying just off the coast of Asia Minor between it and the island of Samos. Their ancient name is related to the homonymous mainland promontory (the coastal terminus of the Mycale mountain ridge).
details: The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: S Dip Burnu
